movies.title: Two Lost in a Dirty Night
movies.plot: Paco and Tonho are illegal Brazilian immigrants in New York. Shy Tonho dreams of being successful, but misses his family and Brazil. Pursued by Immigration Service and later arrested, he is about to be deported. Paco, a rapper and performer, indifferent to all except her career, dreams of hitting the top ten chart. The film shows the relationship of the couple in love mid hope, difficulties, and misencounters in a beautiful and violent metropolis.
movies.simplePlot: Paco and Tonho are illegal Brazilian immigrants in New York. Shy Tonho dreams of being successful, but misses his family and Brazil. Pursued by Immigration Service and later arrested, he is...

biography.bio: Guy is a Los Angeles based actor, screenwriter, producer and teacher. He is quickly being branded as the 'go to guy' for his risk taking and willingness to go the distance in powerful, vulnerable, spontaneous and deeply affecting work on film and stage. Guy starred as Harry in the LA premiere of Chinese Coffee by Ira Lewis. He received rave reviews for his work; most notably the LA Times & LA Weekly. The highly esteemed Jack Heller directed the play and Guy co-produced the play. In addition, Guy produced the critically acclaimed production of Jean Cocteau's The Human Voice at the Elephant Theatre. The play starred Ho-Jung in a powerful, protean performance directed by multiple award-winning director, Dan Bonnell. Guy has written two feature length screenplays, one of which is in development. As a teacher/coach, Guy teaches RAW Monday Nights, a weekly scene study-audition technique class out of his studio, RAW acting studio in Hollywood. He also coaches privately and his seminars/workshops are in high demand in the US and abroad. His approach to acting and teaching is a combination of studying for seven years with master teacher/director Gene Frankel in New York. Guy's teachers in Los Angeles include Bobby Moresco and Catlin Adams. He is a proud member of the Writers Boot Camp and the MSA (Malibu Surfing Association). When his schedule permits, Guy is competing in surf contests up and down the coast of California and assists in keeping the ocean healthy.
biography.name: Guy Camilleri

biography.placeOfBirth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Roberto Bomtempo was born on May 27, 1963 in Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil as Roberto Bomtempo de Castro Júnior. He is an actor and director, known for Bicho do Mato (2006), Tolerance (2000) and Who Killed Pixote? (1996).
biography.name: Roberto Bomtempo

biography.bio: Theodoris Castellanos is an actor, known for Two Lost in a Dirty Night (2002).
biography.name: Theodoris Castellanos

biography.bio: Débora Falabella was born on February 22, 1979 in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil as Débora Lima Falabella. She is known for her work on Little Missy (2006), Brazil Avenue (2012) and Two Faces (2007). She has been married to Murilo Benício since October 1, 2012. She was previously married to Chuck Hypólito.
biography.name: Débora Falabella

biography.bio: John Gilleece is an actor, known for Two Lost in a Dirty Night (2002), A Guy Named Rick (2013) and The Children of Hip Hop (2016).
biography.name: John Gilleece

biography.bio: David Herman is an actor, known for Lower City (2005), Woman on Top (2000) and Head Over Heels (2010).
biography.name: David Herman

biography.bio: Daniel Anthony Porto was born as Daniel Joe Porto. He is known for his work on Sei-Ow-Hai (2008), Charlie (2015) and White Men Can't Jump (1992).
biography.name: Daniel Anthony Porto

biography.bio: Richard Velazquez is known for his work on Paranormal State (2007), D.E.A. (2008) and The Apprentice (2004).
biography.name: Richard Velazquez

categories.category: Best Actress (Melhor Atriz - Rio de Janeiro)
